channel.title: Arena and Doughman
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Arena and Doughman"

item.title: Re: Arena and Doughman
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the correction, I thought that I could never get him! ;P

item.title: Re: Arena and Doughman
item.content:encoded: The growing belief is that you don't need 500 rep at all, yeah. I'll update the page.

item.title: Arena and Doughman
item.content:encoded:
I'm not sure if this is the right place to post, but the character page for Doughman says:

Be Season 2+, win 10+ Arena games and earn 500+ reputation points in a single day.

but I got him without reaching 500 today:

Plays Left Today: 1
Wins today: 10
Plays so far today: 12
Alltime Stats (Wins / Total): 23.5 / 45
Number of Timeouts: 0
Reputation Points Today: 465
Reputation Points Total: 743
